QuestData.Title: Slaying the Scavengers
QuestData.Description: The rotting corpses are attracting hyena scavengers.$B$BIn addition to spreading diseases from feeding on the dead, the feral creatures will attack us on sight.$B$BGo and eradicate the beasts. It is unfortunate, but ultimately for the best.
QuestData.CompletionText: It is better to be safe than sorry.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $n. It was an unpleasant task, but it had to be done.
